UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's public profile information.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user profile was created.

WorkoutPlan.title: Workout Plan
WorkoutPlan.description: A structured workout plan for a user.

title.description: The name of the workout plan.

day.description: The name of the workout day (e.g., 'Treino A').

exercises.description: List of exercises for the day.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the plan was saved.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this plan.

Exercise.title: Exercise
Exercise.description: A single exercise within a workout plan.

gifUrl.description: URL for an animated GIF demonstrating the exercise.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public information about a user.

/users/{userId}/plans/{planId}.description: Stores the workout plans created by a user.
